name: Gardenbox
description:
A very small simulation.

You can move any object inside the box.  Water your plants, see them grow and even change the color of anything. It's up to you to make your Gardenbox as harmonious as possible!

Left click to pan the camera

Right click to rotate the camera

Scrollwheel to zoom

    Grow plants 

    Change color

 Turn on/off the light

The color palette available changes every day!

By Theotime Vaillant

Font "billy" by Claire Joines and "Westfalia" by Rambler Creative

Sounds from Freesound.org
